name: Charged Attack
desc: You gather yourself before unleashing a devastating attack.
effect: Choose a _Major Attack_ with a _Charged Effect_. Instead of immediately making the _Attack_, instead create a _Hazard_ equal to the _Area_ the _Charged Effect_ would Target (a single space within _Range_ if no Area is listed). End your _Turn_, then become _Charging_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove _Charging_ and the _Hazard_, then resolve the _Attack_ against all creatures in the _Area_. You may choose to not make this _Attack_ and instead gain 2 _Momentum_ when removing the _Hazard_.
special: You may only use this _Attack_ when a _Technique_ specifically says to use it.

name: Chip Shot
desc: You fire a small shards of stone, pelting foes and limiting their reactions.
special: If you are adjacent to an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ or _Jagged_ space, this _Attack_ is instead _Speed_ 4. Originate the Attack from that space instead of your own and ignore its _Close Range_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: The Special instead applies if there is an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ within Range 3 or, if you choose an adjacent _Obstacle_, you gain a +1 _Bonus_ to the Attack.

name: Cutting Veil
desc: You viciously rip water upward, disorienting a creature with a sudden veil of cutting water.
special: This _Attack_ may only target _Soaked_ enemies or those in a _Watery_ space. After completing the _Attack_, reduce _Soaked_ or the value of the space by 1, whichever is applicable. If they are in a _Water Veil_, do not reduce the value of the Veil and the _Attack_ has _Advantage_.

analysis_notes.notes: Small bump for targeting considerations, since the Water Veil effect doesn't offset.

name: Earthen Needles
desc: You swiftly form and fire an array of needles, barraging a foe with them.
special: You may instead choose an _Earthen_ _Jagged_ space within Range. If you do, the Cost is instead 1. Remove the _Jagged_ space and originate the Attack from there, with a _Range_ of 4 and removing _Close Range_.

name: Earthquake Step
desc: You bring a leg crashing down, causing a shockwave to emanate forth and disrupt foe's footing.
special: Any _Prone_ creatures in the _Area_ take +2 Damage on a _Hit_+.
boost:
Choose any number:
* 1 _Momentum_: The Area becomes _Rough_.

name: Grapple
desc: You attempt to grab a foe, doing limited damage but limiting their mobility.

name: Heavy Slam
desc: An untrained strike making use of a heavy form to body-slam a foe.

name: Quickened Attack
desc: You find it easy to slip in additional strike with a swift weapon.
effect:
Use a _Light_ _Major Attack_ with a _Speed_ of 3 or less. The _Speed_ of this Attack is adjusted as follows:
* _Speed_ 1: _Speed_ 4
* _Speed_ 2: _Speed_ 6
* _Speed_ 3: _Speed_ 8

name: Ram
desc: A forceful attack that powers through enemies using the weight of ones' body.
special: Decrease the _Speed_ of this _Technique_ by 3 and add _Forceful_ to all _Push_ if it is used while you are making [_Breach_] Movement.

name: Riptide
desc: You pull water towards you forcefully, dragging others with it.
effect: _Draw_ up to 3 within _Range_. Resolve the below attack against a single creature between you and each _Drawn_ _Source_, including creatures in those _Sources_. You may _Draw_ multiple times from the same _Source_; if you do, add _Pull_ 1 and deal +1 Damage on the _Attack_ rather than attacking a different creature. You may also do this if the creature is between you and multiple _Drawn_ _Sources_. After resolving the _Attack_, create _Wet_ spaces adjacent to you equal to the amount you _Drew_.
special: After your foe _Negates_ you may replace any amount of inflicted _Pull_ with _Vulnerable_.
charged_effect: When _Charged_, mark the _Sources_ you are _Drawing_ from as a _Hazard_. Add _Prone_ [2 _Grit_/_Reflex_] on a 7+.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Do not deal Damage to one Target, but automatically roll a 9. You may choose this _Boost_ multiple times.
* 2 _Momentum_: _Draw_ one more. You may repeat this Boost up to 3 times.

name: Roiling Tide
desc: A surge of water that can push or pull, depending on one's intent.
effect: You must _Draw_ 1 as a part of this Attack.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may choose to make the Attack originate from the _Drawn_ _Source_ if it is within Range 3. Remove _Close Range_ when used in this way.

name: Slam
desc: An untrained strike making use of the body itself to body-slam a foe.

name: Spire Strike
desc: You pull the earth upwards into a jagged spike, surprising a foe.
effect: Choose a foe within _Range_. Immediately make an unoccupied _Earthen_ space adjacent to them _Jagged_, then resolve this Attack as a _Melee_ Attack originating from that space. If the space was already _Jagged_, instead make it an _Earth Spire_, add [_Pierce_ 1] to the Attack, add _Restrained_ [1_Reflex_] to a 6-7, and increase the cost to Negate _Restrained_ by 1 on an 8+.
special: If this Attack inflicts _Restrained_, the effect automatically ends if the _Jagged_ space or _Earth Spire_ is removed. Otherwise, the creature may spend 2 _Grit_ and resolve the effect of ending their Turn in a _Jagged_ space to end the effect.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: You may instead make an occupied _Earthen_ space _Jagged_. If this would result in it becoming a _Earth Spire_, resolve the _Jagged_ effect against the creature in that space, then _Slide_ 1 that creature if they may not longer occupy this space. They may not Negate.
charged_effect: Mark the space the Attack will originate from with a _Hazard_. Create an _Earth Spire_ even if the space is not _Jagged_, and resolve that effect. If the space was already _Jagged_, gain a +1 _Bonus_.

name: Stone Strike
desc: You fling a stone at great speed, knocking enemies off-balance.
special: If you are adjacent to an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ or _Jagged_ space, this _Attack_ is instead _Speed_ 5. Originate the Attack from that space instead of your own and ignore its _Close Range_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: The Special instead applies if there is an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ within Range 3 or, if you choose an adjacent _Obstacle_, you gain a +1 _Bonus_ to the Attack.
charged_effect: Instead, this Attack is _Self_-Range _Line_ 6, or a _Line_ 6 originating from the relevant Obstacle, if applicable.

name: Surprise Strike
desc: An unexpected attack using an unlikely weapon.
reqs: Must be made with an _Opportune Weapon_.
effect: Make an _Attack_ using an _Opportune  Weapon_ that was _Wielded_ this _Turn_. Treat its _Speed_ as 1 lower, and add _Vulnerable_ 1, _Slowed_ (2 _Poise_).

name: Swift Slam
desc: A quick strike making use of the body itself to body-slam a foe.

name: Swipe
desc: A swift attack using a natural weapon.
effect: Make an _Attack_ using a _Natural_  Weapon, adding [_Glancing_]. Refer to the Weapon for all details about the specific Attack, such as its _Speed_ and whether it is _Light_, _Versatile_, or _Heavy_.

name: Toxic Spray
desc: A short-ranged spray of toxic chemicals.

name: Unarmed Strike
desc: An untrained yet still effective strike.

name: Weapon Attack
desc: You strike with a weapon.
effect: Make an Attack using a _Wielded_ Weapon. Refer to the Weapon for all details about the specific Attack, such as its _Speed_ and whether it is _Light_, _Versatile_, or _Heavy_.
